Question: Check-in area kahan hai?
Answer: Check-in area departure floor ke main entrance ke foran baad hai. Har airline ka apna counter hota hai jahan staff aapki madad karta hai.

Question: Parking se terminal kaise jaun?
Answer: Parking area se “Departures” ke boards follow karein. Lift aur ramp dono available hain taake aap asani se saman le ja sakein.

Question: Baggage wrapping service kahan milti hai?
Answer: Baggage wrapping service check-in counter ke paas hoti hai. Ye service aapke bag ko flight ke dauran safe rakhti hai.

Question: Information desk kahan hai?
Answer: Information desk entrance ke paas hai jahan staff flights, gates aur facilities ke bare mein madad karta hai.

Question: Trolley kahan se milegi?
Answer: Trolley har entrance aur check-in area ke paas mil jati hai. Ye free hoti hai aur har waqt available rehti hai.

Question: Gate 8 kahan hai?
Answer: Gate 8 security check ke baad right side par hai. Wahan clear boards lage hue hain jo direction batate hain.

Question: Washroom kahan hai?
Answer: Har 2 gates ke darmiyan washroom hai. Gate 3, 6 aur 9 ke paas washrooms sabse qareeb hain.

Question: Lounge available hai?
Answer: Haan, business class aur VIP passengers ke liye lounge hai. Paid entry bhi mil sakti hai agar aap chahen.

Question: Khana kahan milta hai?
Answer: Departure hall mein coffee aur snacks ke liye cafes aur fast food counters available hain. Gloria Jeans aur Cinnabon famous hain.

Question: Namaz kahan par parh sakta hoon?
Answer: Namaz ke liye alag kamra gate 5 ke paas hai. Mardon aur khawateen ke liye alag jagah banai gayi hai.

Question: Security check kahan hota hai?
Answer: Check-in ke baad security area aata hai jahan saman aur ticket dono check kiye jate hain.

Question: Samaan ka weight kahan check hota hai?
Answer: Airline counter par weight machine hoti hai jahan aap apne bags weigh karwa sakte hain.

Question: Wheelchair service milti hai?
Answer: Haan, wheelchair service available hai. Information desk se madad mang sakte hain.

Question: Gate tak kitna time lagta hai?
Answer: Security check ke baad aam tor par gate tak 5 se 10 minutes lagte hain.

Question: Charging point kahan milta hai?
Answer: Har waiting area ke paas charging points aur USB ports lage hue hain.

Question: Free WiFi milta hai?
Answer: Haan, “IIAP-FreeWiFi” network se connect karke free internet use kar sakte hain.

Question: Agar gate change ho jaye to?
Answer: Screen par updated information aati hai aur loudspeaker se announce bhi hoti hai.

Question: Staff madad karta hai?
Answer: Bilkul, airport staff har section mein maujood hota hai madad ke liye.

Question: Shopping kar sakte hain?
Answer: Haan, duty free shops aur gift stores lounges ke andar available hain.

Question: Family andar aa sakti hai?
Answer: Sirf ticket holders andar ja sakte hain. Family farewell area tak aa sakti hai.

Question: Security ke baad wapas ja sakte hain?
Answer: Nahi, security ke baad wapas jana allowed nahi hota.

Question: ATM machine hai?
Answer: Haan, ATM machines main hall aur departure lounge dono jagah par hain.

Question: Bachon ke liye play area hai?
Answer: Haan, gate 7 ke paas chhota play area bana hua hai bachon ke liye.

Question: Pani ki bottle le ja sakta hoon?
Answer: Security ke baad pani le jane ki ijazat nahi hoti. Andar se bottles mil jati hain.

Question: Prayer room mein announcement sunai deti hai?
Answer: Haan, prayer room mein speakers lage hain taake aap announcements miss na karein.

Question: Smoking area hai?
Answer: Haan, gate 10 ke paas smoking zone hai jo ventilated hai.

Question: Immigration process mushkil hai?
Answer: Nahi, staff helpful hai. Passport aur ticket ready rakhein taake process asaan ho.

Question: Gate change ho jaye to kya karun?
Answer: Nearby staff se confirm karein ya digital screen dekhein for latest update.

Question: Shopping available hai?
Answer: Haan, perfumes, chocolates aur souvenirs duty free shops mein milte hain.

Question: Medical help mil sakti hai?
Answer: Haan, emergency clinic departure floor par hai jo 24 ghante khula rehta hai.

Question: Gate ke paas seats hain?
Answer: Haan, har gate ke paas comfortable seats hain jahan aap araam kar sakte hain.

Question: Announcements English mein bhi hote hain?
Answer: Haan, announcements Urdu aur English dono languages mein hoti hain.

Question: Charging free hai?
Answer: Haan, saare charging stations free hain sab passengers ke liye.

Question: Pani ka dispenser kahan hai?
Answer: Water dispensers har gate ke paas lage hue hain. Aap apni bottle fill kar sakte hain.

Question: Bag kho jaye to kya karun?
Answer: Lost & Found desk par report karein. Staff turant madad karta hai.

Question: Kya apna khana la sakta hoon?
Answer: Haan, lekin liquid ya strong smell wala food allowed nahi hota.

Question: Dawaiyan kahin se milengi?
Answer: Haan, ek pharmacy lounge ke paas hai jahan basic medicines milti hain.

Question: SIM stall kahan hai?
Answer: Entrance ke paas Jazz, Zong aur Ufone ke stalls maujood hain.

Question: Boarding ke baad wapas ja sakta hoon?
Answer: Nahi, boarding ke baad sirf authorized staff hi gate open kar sakta hai.

Question: Lounge mein newspaper milta hai?
Answer: Haan, lounge mein daily newspapers aur travel magazines milte hain.

Question: Intercom system hai?
Answer: Haan, har zone mein intercom lagay hue hain for quick communication.

Question: Mobile use kar sakte hain?
Answer: Haan, lekin security area mein mobile band rakhein.

Question: Card payment hoti hai?
Answer: Haan, saare cafes aur shops card payments accept karte hain.

Question: Old passengers ke sath koi ja sakta hai?
Answer: Haan, special permission ke sath ek person unke sath ja sakta hai.

Question: Boarding ke time announcements hote hain?
Answer: Haan, clear aur loud announcements hoti hain boarding ke waqt.

Question: Flight updates SMS par milte hain?
Answer: Haan, agar number register ho to SMS updates automatically milte hain.

Question: Return flight info mil sakti hai?
Answer: Haan, information desk par sab flights ka schedule available hai.

Question: Mask pehna zaroori hai?
Answer: Abhi wajib nahi, lekin health ke liye recommend kiya jata hai.

Question: Power bank le ja sakta hoon?
Answer: Haan, lekin sirf hand carry bag mein rakhna allowed hai.

Question: International flights ke liye alag area hai?
Answer: Haan, international flights ke liye alag security aur lounge zone hota hai. Staff wahan guide karta hai.

Question: Airport par boarding gate tak kaise pohonchein?
Answer: Apne boarding pass aur display boards check karein, sahi gate identify karein aur waqt se pehle wahan pohonchein. Staff ki guidance follow karein.

Question: Check-in ke baad luggage kaise organize karein?
Answer: Luggage tag check karein, hand luggage overhead compartment ya seat ke neeche rakhein, aur prohibited items alag karein. Staff ki guidance follow karein.

Question: Flight delay hone par kya steps lene chahiye?
Answer: Airline notifications aur display board check karein, waiting area me relax karein, aur staff se alternate options aur estimated time confirm karein.

Question: Children ke sath flight me comfort kaise ensure karein?
Answer: Pillow aur blanket use karein, peaceful environment banayein, headphone ya eye mask use karein, aur bachon ke qareeb rahen.

Question: Lost luggage ki situation me kya karein?
Answer: Information desk ya airline counter se contact karein, report file karein, receipt aur details safe rakhein, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Flight me mobile aur wifi kaise use karein?
Answer: Mobile flight mode par rakhein, wifi available ho to airline services use karein, calls aur data restricted hain, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Boarding ke waqt line me patience kaise maintain karein?
Answer: Boarding group ke according line me pohonchein, boarding pass ready rakhein, respectfully wait karein, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Flight me children ke entertainment kaise arrange karein?
Answer: Stories, games aur movies arrange karein, headphone use karein, snacks aur water sath rakhein, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Airport par priority service kaise avail karein?
Answer: Premium ticket ya reservation ke mutabiq dedicated lane use karein, aur staff instructions follow karein taake boarding easy ho.

Question: Flight me comfortable sleep ke liye kya karein?
Answer: Pillow aur blanket use karein, seat recline karein, headphone ya eye mask use karein, water regular piyein, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Flight me health aur hygiene kaise maintain karein?
Answer: Hands wash karein ya sanitizer use karein, mask pehnein agar required ho, water regular piyein, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Airport shopping ke liye kya steps follow karein?
Answer: Time pehle se plan karein, official shops use karein, receipts safe rakhein, boarding ke pehle shopping complete karein, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Flight me personal electronics ki safety kaise ensure karein?
Answer: Laptop, mobile aur devices close rakhein, security check me separate karein, charger aur battery rules follow karein, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Airport emergency me kya steps follow karein?
Answer: Staff instructions par instantly act karein, boarding pass aur ID ready rakhein, calm rahen, aur exit routes use karein.

Question: Flight me children ki safety ke liye kya precautions hain?
Answer: Seat belt always bandhein, mask ya life jacket use karein, calm rahen, aur bachon ke qareeb rahen.

Answer: Passport, boarding pass aur ID ready rakhein, extra receipt ya print sath rakhein, aur staff instructions follow karein.

Question: Flight me children ke liye meals kaise provide karein?

Question: Flight emergency me kya actions lene chahiye?
Answer: Staff instructions follow karein, seat belt bandhein, exit routes aur oxygen mask use karein, aur children ya elderly ki help karein.
